channel.title: Gr8 New Idea, CHoose What u Train
channel.description:
when ur fighting players 1 on 1,
u could only train combat stuff..
but what if..
you could chose toi train smith while fighting.
Gr8 idea i thought by myself..
only 1 problem..
How do i do this..
i wos wondering if some1 could help me finding out..
Greets Chrisz

item.title: Gr8 New Idea, CHoose What u Train
item.dc:creator: @coder_no0b coder no0b
item.description:
@coder_no0b wrote:

to me stupid ,but wery usefull idea. just enter the exp given in client .j and add any stat

item.title: Gr8 New Idea, CHoose What u Train

item.description:
@Reddy wrote:

Nice idea… not sure though, very nice idea tho lol. youd probly have to find in client.java what you train on players… no idea but again great idea! love it i would rep++ if i could lolz.
